content: this soft and light wrap will curl around you like a fern frond you will need only one ball of beautiful pittura yarn or any similar fingering yarn to make this unusual asymmetric wrap alternating solid and lace row makes this a quick and fun project this pattern was completely revised and a us version added on 30 march 2020 **please note that the main stitch used in this pattern is the treble uk treble_crochet this is the tall stitch which begins with yarn over hook twice ****
